creator: khaprenalin@yahoo.com
vgritsenko@apache.org
text:
Current Xindice CVS compiles just fine, so this is INVALID.

PS If you are trying to compile old beta release, seems like you've got new
version of Xalan somewhere (jdk14 comes to mind - try jdk13 instead). Replace it
with the one which comes with xindice distribution - that's what it was built
with (in jdk14 this means specifying endorsed libs directory).

creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
text: *** Bug 26766 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
